logo.name: Logo
logo.description: The link to the logo. This uses Inline SVG, use only the logo name i.e. `logo`.

logoClasses.name: Logo classes
logoClasses.description: Additional classes to add to the logo. Defaults to `w-36 h-auto`

url.name: Url
url.description: The link for the button. Only used when the button is an anchor link.

target.name: Target
target.description: The target of the link. Defaults to `_self`. If the target is set to `_blank`, the rel will be set to `noopener noreferrer`.

linkClasses.name: Link classes
linkClasses.description: Additional classes to add to the link. Defaults to `inline-flex`.
